name: passive-analytics
description: A leightweight analytics framework for websites and applications.

scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run test && tsc
scripts.build:demo: npm run lint && npm run test && webpack --config webpack.demo.js
scripts.build:dist:dev: npm run lint && npm run test && webpack --config webpack.dev.js
scripts.build:dist:prod: npm run lint && npm run test && webpack --config webpack.prod.js

author: Mike Rood
